医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示极端高温对无家可归者死亡率的影响由于其生活状况的性质，无家可归者 (PEH) 被认为是最容易受到极端天气健康影响的人群之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Study-reveals-extreme-heats-impact-on-homeless-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Study-reveals-extreme-heats-impact-on-homeless-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b90b9c78-a146-4771-96ed-f04a73c9d1a0 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 21:18:45 -0400 Study reveals extreme heat's impact on homeless mortality
研究揭示细菌自私如何影响抗生素耐药策略随着对一线抗生素产生耐药性的病原体菌株在世界范围内变得越来越普遍，临床医生越来越多地将降低这种耐药性的联合治疗作为首选治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Study-reveals-how-bacterial-selfishness-affects-antibiotic-resistance-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Study-reveals-how-bacterial-selfishness-affects-antibiotic-resistance-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2eef5d96-9922-445e-975e-c6ac136e3179 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 21:12:29 -0400 Study reveals how bacterial selfishness affects antibiotic resistance strategies
密歇根州立大学研究人员测试新的纳米疗法输注以靶向动脉炎症动脉炎症是心血管疾病的主要前兆和驱动因素；美国第一大杀人杀手。这种炎症与动脉内危险斑块的积聚有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/MSU-researchers-test-new-nanotherapy-infusion-to-target-arterial-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/MSU-researchers-test-new-nanotherapy-infusion-to-target-arterial-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14cc5ef4-0bd9-4774-b550-88d2acb91f96 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 21:04:16 -0400 MSU researchers test new nanotherapy infusion to target arterial inflammation
研究人员警告不要依赖人工智能聊天机器人获取药物安全信息《BMJ 质量与安全》杂志的研究人员在发现大量答案错误或可能有害后得出结论，患者不应依赖人工智能驱动的搜索引擎和聊天机器人来始终为他们提供准确且安全的药物信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Researchers-warn-against-relying-on-AI-chatbots-for-drug-safety-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Researchers-warn-against-relying-on-AI-chatbots-for-drug-safety-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e3d4bc7-400a-4a28-a7b3-3f2554507820 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:59:23 -0400 Researchers warn against relying on AI chatbots for drug safety information
研究人员获得 700 万美元资助，用于创新肺部感染的益生菌治疗方法加州大学圣地亚哥分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员获得了卫生高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 高达 700 万美元的资助，用于在 PROTECT 项目下开展研究；用于优化治疗和消除临床威胁的益生元/益生元调节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Researchers-awarded-247-million-to-innovate-probiotic-treatments-for-lung-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Researchers-awarded-247-million-to-innovate-probiotic-treatments-for-lung-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7753a317-59c6-42dc-98e8-1dac604d08fd Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:56:22 -0400 Researchers awarded $7 million to innovate probiotic treatments for lung infections
研究强调反馈在青少年心理保健中的重要性爱思唯尔出版的《美国儿童和青少年精神病学学会杂志》(JAACAP) 上的一项研究报告称，通过向临床医生提供频繁的青少年和家庭反馈以及指导领导者支持临床医生的治疗，可以提高青少年心理健康服务的有效性。有效利用反馈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Research-highlights-importance-of-feedback-in-youth-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Research-highlights-importance-of-feedback-in-youth-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a90a61e8-eceb-4aa8-a8b1-dc379355359e Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:39:18 -0400 Research highlights importance of feedback in youth mental health care
开展主要研究探索饮食和运动对转移性乳腺癌患者的益处一项重大研究正在招募 200 人，调查饮食和运动如何帮助转移性乳腺癌患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Major-study-launched-to-explore-diet-and-exercise-benefits-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Major-study-launched-to-explore-diet-and-exercise-benefits-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e8d9368-5eca-4672-93fc-4a9941d25b7f Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:35:05 -0400 Major study launched to explore diet and exercise benefits for metastatic breast cancer patients
党派偏见和社会经济因素影响 COVID-19 疫苗接种率COVID-19 疫苗接种率因党派和社会经济因素而存在显着差异，民主党人比共和党人和独立人士接种疫苗的速度更快、比例更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Partisanship-and-socioeconomic-factors-affect-COVID-19-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Partisanship-and-socioeconomic-factors-affect-COVID-19-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6699886-5cf1-4388-8e24-9f353006f47b Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:30:48 -0400 Partisanship and socioeconomic factors affect COVID-19 vaccination rates
阿肯色大学获得美国国立卫生研究院资助，用于研究医疗保健中的情境偏见美国国立卫生研究院向阿肯色大学心理学助理教授阿纳斯塔西娅·马哈诺娃 (Anastasia Makhanova) 授予了近 340 万美元的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/University-of-Arkansas-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-situational-bias-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/University-of-Arkansas-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-situational-bias-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf3dcb45-986f-4d02-8a27-653213fb147b Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:27:05 -0400 University of Arkansas receives NIH grant to study situational bias in healthcare
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助支持骨骼干细胞在颅面骨疾病中的研究UTHealth 休斯顿的研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的 810 万美元拨款，用于研究骨骼干细胞作为颅面骨疾病和畸形的潜在驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/NIH-funding-supports-investigation-of-skeletal-stem-cells-in-craniofacial-bone-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/NIH-funding-supports-investigation-of-skeletal-stem-cells-in-craniofacial-bone-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1542c0fb-10dc-4951-84aa-10b52bf28b61 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 20:24:16 -0400 NIH funding supports investigation of skeletal stem cells in craniofacial bone disorders
